crew.p: Choreography: Rūta Pūce un Anna Novikova
Performers: Anna Novikova un Agate Bankava
Producer: Ina Ločmele, Party and dance company Ārā

body.p: It becomes difficult to decide who I actually am. Definitely, I am a mother, because I have a child. But simultaneously, I am someone else. Someone I am not familiar with. Neither a mother, nor myself, before becoming one. Someone who is extremely valuable and decisive and probably has nothing to do with my mothers’ role, and yet adorned by the procreation. There is both a mother and a not-mother in me. I contain motherhood and Her, and I don’t have to choose one, only balance, only master, only listen to my twoness.
